news_header: Glaciers are melting rapidly due to climate change, impacting freshwater resources and global sea levels.
news_original_title: World's glaciers melting faster than ever recorded
news_text: The world's glaciers are melting faster than ever due to climate change, losing over 6,500 billion tonnes of ice since 2000. This impacts freshwater resources and global sea levels, with significant consequences for millions of people reliant on glacier meltwater.
